part:
DynModes_$ = ##modes##
DynLength_$ = ##length##
DynWidth_$ = ##width##
DynThickness_$ = ##thickness##
DynDensity_$ = ##density##
DynYoung_$ = ##young##
DynPoisson_$ = ##poisson##
DynFreqLoss_$ = ##freqLoss##
DynConstLoss_$ = ##constLoss##
bar_$ = make_object('RECT-FREE-BAR', DynModes_$, DynLength_$, DynWidth_$, DynThickness_$, DynDensity_$, DynYoung_$, DynYoung_$, DynPoisson_$, DynFreqLoss_$, DynConstLoss_$)
@@pitch
DynPitch_$ = make_controller('CONSTANT', 1, ##pitch##)
bar_$ = set_pitch(bar_$, 'LENGTH', DynPitch_$)
pitch@@
ConstantController_10_$ = make_controller('CONSTANT', 1, 0.1)
ConstantController_11_$ = make_controller('CONSTANT', 1, 0.1)
ConstantController_12_$ = make_controller('CONSTANT', 1, 100000)
ConstantController_13_$ = make_controller('CONSTANT', 1, 100)
ConstantController_14_$ = make_controller('CONSTANT', 1, 0)
MY_HAMMER_$ = make_object('MONO-TWO-MASS', ConstantController_10_$, ConstantController_11_$, ConstantController_12_$, ConstantController_13_$, ConstantController_14_$)
ConstantController_19_$ = ##impactCoords##
MY_BAR_HIT_$ = make_access(bar_$, ConstantController_19_$, 'NORMAL')
ConstantController_20_$ = make_controller('CONSTANT', 1, [1])
MY_HAMMER_HIT_$ = make_access(MY_HAMMER_$, ConstantController_20_$, 'TRANS0')
ConstantController_21_$ = make_controller('CONSTANT', 1, [0.01])
ConstantController_22_$ = make_controller('CONSTANT', 1, [1e+09])
ConstantController_23_$ = make_controller('CONSTANT', 1, [2.3])
ConstantController_24_$ = make_controller('CONSTANT', 1, [0.83])
ConstantController_25_$ = make_controller('CONSTANT', 1, [0.004])
%FeltConnection_1_$ = make_connection('FELT', MY_BAR_HIT_$, 0, MY_HAMMER_HIT_$, 0.25, ConstantController_21_$, ConstantController_22_$, ConstantController_23_$, ConstantController_24_$, ConstantController_25_$)
StrikeConnection_1_$ = make_connection('STRIKE', MY_BAR_HIT_$, 0, MY_HAMMER_HIT_$, 0.25)
ConstantController_26_$ = make_controller('CONSTANT', 1, [0])
MY_HAMMER_MOV_$ = make_access(MY_HAMMER_$, ConstantController_26_$, 'TRANS0')
MalletPosition_$ = ##malletPosition##
PositionConnection_1_$ = make_connection('POSITION', MY_HAMMER_MOV_$, MalletPosition_$)
ConstantController_27_$ = ##outputPoint##
MY_BAR_OUT_$ = make_access(bar_$, ConstantController_27_$, 'NORMAL')
OUTPUTGAIN_$ = ##outputgain##
PointOutput_1_$ = make_point_output(MY_BAR_OUT_$, 0, OUTPUTGAIN_$)
